verses.verse: Then Jerubbaal, <WH3378> who <WH1931> is Gideon, <WH1439> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, rose up early, <WH7925> and pitched <WH2583> beside <WH5921> the well <WH5878> of Harod: <WH5878> so that the host <WH4264> of the Midianites <WH4080> were <WH1961> on the north side <WH4480> <WH6828> of them, by the hill <WH4480> <WH1389> of Moreh, <WH4176> in the valley. <WH6010>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Gideon, <WH1439> The people <WH5971> that <WH834> are with <WH854> thee are too many <WH7227> for me to give <WH5414> <WH853> the Midianites <WH4080> into their hands, <WH3027> lest <WH6435> Israel <WH3478> vaunt themselves <WH6286> against <WH5921> me, saying, <WH559> Mine own hand <WH3027> hath saved <WH3467> me.

Now <WH6288> therefore go to, <WH4994> proclaim <WH7121> in the ears <WH241> of the people, <WH5971> saying, <WH559> Whosoever <WH4310> is fearful <WH3373> and afraid, <WH2730> let him return <WH7725> and depart early <WH6852> from mount <WH4480> <WH2022> Gilead. <WH1568> And there returned <WH7725> of <WH4480> the people <WH5971> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> thousand; <WH505> and there remained <WH7604> ten <WH6235> thousand. <WH505>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Gideon, <WH1439> The people <WH5971> are yet <WH5750> too many; <WH7227> bring them down <WH3381> <WH853> unto <WH413> the water, <WH4325> and I will try <WH6884> them for thee there: <WH8033> and it shall be, <WH1961> that of whom <WH834> I say <WH559> unto <WH413> thee, This <WH2088> shall go <WH1980> with <WH854> thee, the same <WH1931> shall go <WH1980> with <WH854> thee; and of whomsoever <WH3605> <WH834> I say <WH559> unto <WH413> thee, This <WH2088> shall not <WH3808> go <WH1980> with <WH5973> thee, the same <WH1931> shall not <WH3808> go. <WH1980>

So he brought down <WH3381> <WH853> the people <WH5971> unto <WH413> the water: <WH4325> and the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Gideon, <WH1439> Every one <WH3605> that <WH834> lappeth <WH3952> of <WH4480> the water <WH4325> with his tongue, <WH3956> as <WH834> a dog <WH3611> lappeth, <WH3952> him shalt thou set <WH3322> by himself; <WH905> likewise every one <WH3605> that <WH834> boweth down <WH3766> upon <WH5921> his knees <WH1290> to drink. <WH8354>

And the number <WH4557> of them that lapped, <WH3952> putting their hand <WH3027> to <WH413> their mouth, <WH6310> were <WH1961> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> men: <WH376> but all <WH3605> the rest <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> bowed down <WH3766> upon <WH5921> their knees <WH1290> to drink <WH8354> water. <WH4325>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Gideon, <WH1439> By the three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> that lapped <WH3952> will I save <WH3467> you, and deliver <WH5414> <WH853> the Midianites <WH4080> into thine hand: <WH3027> and let all <WH3605> the other people <WH5971> go <WH1980> every man <WH376> unto his place. <WH4725>

So the people <WH5971> took <WH3947> <WH853> victuals <WH6720> in their hand, <WH3027> and their trumpets: <WH7782> and he sent <WH7971> all <WH3605> the rest of Israel <WH3478> every man <WH376> unto his tent, <WH168> and retained <WH2388> those three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> men: <WH376> and the host <WH4264> of Midian <WH4080> was <WH1961> beneath <WH4480> <WH8478> him in the valley. <WH6010>

And it came to pass <WH1961> the same <WH1931> night, <WH3915> that the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Arise, <WH6965> get thee down <WH3381> unto the host; <WH4264> for <WH3588> I have delivered <WH5414> it into thine hand. <WH3027>
But if <WH518> thou <WH859> fear <WH3372> to go down, <WH3381> go <WH3381> thou <WH859> with Phurah <WH6513> thy servant <WH5288> down <WH3381> to <WH413> the host: <WH4264>

And thou shalt hear <WH8085> what <WH4100> they say; <WH1696> and afterward <WH310> shall thine hands <WH3027> be strengthened <WH2388> to go down <WH3381> unto the host. <WH4264> Then went he down <WH3381> with Phurah <WH6513> his servant <WH5288> unto <WH413> the outside <WH7097> of the armed men <WH2571> that <WH834> were in the host. <WH4264>

And the Midianites <WH4080> and the Amalekites <WH6003> and all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of the east <WH6924> lay <WH5307> along in the valley <WH6010> like grasshoppers <WH697> for multitude; <WH7230> and their camels <WH1581> were without <WH369> number, <WH4557> as the sand <WH2344> by <WH7945> <WH5921> the sea <WH3220> side <WH8193> for multitude. <WH7230>

And when Gideon <WH1439> was come, <WH935> behold, <WH2009> there was a man <WH376> that told <WH5608> a dream <WH2472> unto his fellow, <WH7453> and said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I dreamed <WH2492> a dream, <WH2472> and, lo, <WH2009> a cake <WH6742> of barley <WH8184> bread <WH3899> tumbled <WH2015> into the host <WH4264> of Midian, <WH4080> and came <WH935> unto <WH5704> a tent, <WH168> and smote <WH5221> it that it fell, <WH5307> and overturned <WH2015> <WH4605> it, that the tent <WH168> lay along. <WH5307>

And his fellow <WH7453> answered <WH6030> and said, <WH559> This <WH2063> is nothing else <WH369> save <WH1115> <WH518> the sword <WH2719> of Gideon <WH1439> the son <WH1121> of Joash, <WH3101> a man <WH376> of Israel: <WH3478> for into his hand <WH3027> hath God <WH430> delivered <WH5414> <WH853> Midian, <WH4080> and all <WH3605> the host. <WH4264>

And it was <WH1961> so, when Gideon <WH1439> heard <WH8085> <WH853> the telling <WH4557> of the dream, <WH2472> and the interpretation <WH7667> thereof, that he worshiped, <WH7812> and returned <WH7725> into <WH413> the host <WH4264> of Israel, <WH3478> and said, <WH559> Arise; <WH6965> for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> hath delivered <WH5414> into your hand <WH3027> <WH853> the host <WH4264> of Midian. <WH4080>

And he divided <WH2673> <WH853> the three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> into three <WH7969> companies, <WH7218> and he put <WH5414> a trumpet <WH7782> in every man's <WH3605> hand, <WH3027> with empty <WH7386> pitchers, <WH3537> and lamps <WH3940> within <WH8432> the pitchers. <WH3537>

And he said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Look <WH7200> on <WH4480> me, and do <WH6213> likewise: <WH3651> and, behold, <WH2009> when I <WH595> come <WH935> to the outside <WH7097> of the camp, <WH4264> it shall be <WH1961> that, as <WH834> I do, <WH6213> so <WH3651> shall ye do. <WH6213>

When I blow <WH8628> with a trumpet, <WH7782> I <WH595> and all <WH3605> that <WH834> are with <WH854> me, then blow <WH8628> ye <WH859> the trumpets <WH7782> also <WH1571> on every side <WH5439> of all <WH3605> the camp, <WH4264> and say, <WH559> The sword of the LORD, <WH3068> and of Gideon. <WH1439>

So Gideon, <WH1439> and the hundred <WH3967> men <WH376> that <WH834> were with <WH854> him, came <WH935> unto the outside <WH7097> of the camp <WH4264> in the beginning <WH7218> of the middle <WH8484> watch; <WH821> and they had but <WH389> newly set <WH6965> <WH6965> <WH853> the watch: <WH8104> and they blew <WH8628> the trumpets, <WH7782> and broke <WH5310> the pitchers <WH3537> that <WH834> were in their hands. <WH3027>

And the three <WH7969> companies <WH7218> blew <WH8628> the trumpets, <WH7782> and broke <WH7665> the pitchers, <WH3537> and held <WH2388> the lamps <WH3940> in their left <WH8040> hands, <WH3027> and the trumpets <WH7782> in their right <WH3225> hands <WH3027> to blow <WH8628> withal: and they cried, <WH7121> The sword <WH2719> of the LORD, <WH3068> and of Gideon. <WH1439>
And they stood <WH5975> every man <WH376> in his place <WH8478> round about <WH5439> the camp: <WH4264> and all <WH3605> the host <WH4264> ran, <WH7323> and cried, <WH7321> and fled. <WH5127>

And the three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> blew <WH8628> the trumpets, <WH7782> and the LORD <WH3068> set <WH7760> <WH853> every man's <WH376> sword <WH2719> against his fellow, <WH7453> even throughout all <WH3605> the host: <WH4264> and the host <WH4264> fled <WH5127> to <WH5704> Beth-shittah <WH1029> in Zererath, <WH6888> and to <WH5704> the border <WH8193> of Abel-meholah, <WH65> unto <WH5921> Tabbath. <WH2888>

And the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> gathered themselves together <WH6817> out of Naphtali, <WH4480> <WH5321> and out of <WH4480> Asher, <WH836> and out of <WH4480> all <WH3605> Manasseh, <WH4519> and pursued <WH7291> after <WH310> the Midianites. <WH4080>

And Gideon <WH1439> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> throughout all <WH3605> mount <WH2022> Ephraim, <WH669> saying, <WH559> Come down <WH3381> against <WH7125> the Midianites, <WH4080> and take <WH3920> before them <WH853> the waters <WH4325> unto <WH5704> Beth-barah <WH1012> and Jordan. <WH3383> Then all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of Ephraim <WH669> gathered themselves together, <WH6817> and took <WH3920> <WH853> the waters <WH4325> unto <WH5704> Beth-barah <WH1012> and Jordan. <WH3383>

And they took <WH3920> two <WH8147> princes <WH8269> of the Midianites, <WH4080> <WH853> Oreb <WH6159> and Zeeb; <WH2062> and they slew <WH2026> <WH853> Oreb <WH6159> upon the rock <WH6697> Oreb, <WH6159> and Zeeb <WH2062> they slew <WH2026> at the winepress <WH3342> of Zeeb, <WH2062> and pursued <WH7291> <WH413> Midian, <WH4080> and brought <WH935> the heads <WH7218> of Oreb <WH6159> and Zeeb <WH2062> to <WH413> Gideon <WH1439> on the other side <WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan. <WH3383>
